dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.
dependencies.name: cmake

dependencies.description: Hiredis is a minimalistic C client library for the Redis database.
dependencies.name: hiredis

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
pybind11 -- Seamless operability between C++11 and Python. pybind11 is a
lightweight header-only library that exposes C++ types in Python and
vice versa, mainly to create Python bindings of existing C++ code. Its
goals and syntax are similar to the excellent Boost.Python library by
David Abrahams: to minimize boilerplate code in traditional extension
modules by inferring type information using compile-time introspection.
dependencies.name: py-pybind11

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependencies.description:
Redis-plus-plus is a C++ client library for Redis and is based on
hiredis, and is compatible with C++ 17, C++ 14, and C++ 11.
dependencies.name: redis-plus-plus

dependent_to.description:
A workflow library to easily integrate machine learning libraries with
high performance computing simulations and applications
dependent_to.name: py-smartsim

description: A Python Interface for the SmartRedis Library Client
name: py-smartredis

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
